Package model

Class Admin

java.lang.Object
model.Admin
public class Admin extends Object
Utility Class to manipulate user database.

    • getUsers

      public static Iterator<User> getUsers()
      Get all the users that are registered to the application
      Returns:
      Iterator over the list of all users

      Returns:

    • addUser

      public static boolean addUser​(String username)
      Add a user to the list of all users
      Parameters:
      username - Username to add into the user list
      Returns:
      True if successful, false indicates user already exists

    • removeUser

      public static void removeUser​(String username)
      Remove a user from the list of all users
      Parameters:
      username - The user's username

    • syncToDisk

      public static void syncToDisk() throws IOException
      Writes all data to disk. Called upon application entry.
      Throws:
      IOException - IO error from writing to disk

    • setupStockUser

      private static void setupStockUser()
      Necessary setup to initialize the stock user of the program. Only called if we are installing a fresh photos save.

    • setupDefaults

      private static void setupDefaults()
      Setup the photos application with the admin and stock user. Only called if we are installing a fresh photos save.

    • loadFromDisk

      public static void loadFromDisk() throws ClassNotFoundException
      Loads in photos data from disk. Called upon application exit and cleanup.
      Throws:
      ClassNotFoundException - Thrown if failed to store data into users list
